title: Nurse charged in death of H.R. McMaster's father
text:
Nurse charged in death of H.R. McMaster's father Thursday, May 10, 2018 - 01:01
Pennsylvania's attorney general Josh Shapiro announced on Thursday that a nurse has been charged in the death of H.R. McMaster Sr., the father of President Trump's former national security adviser. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Pennsylvania's attorney general Josh Shapiro announced on Thursday that a nurse has been charged in the death of H.R. McMaster Sr., the father of President Trump's former national security adviser.
